
Command to spin docker container
docker run -ti -h pff -v $(pwd):/root/live -p 9999:9999 ubuntu:latest /bin/bash

docker run -ti -h pff -v $(pwd):/root/live -p 9999:9999 ubuntu:latest /bin/bash

jupyter lab --allow-root --ip 0.0.0.0 --port 9999

Connecting to existing container
docker exec -it quizzical_nobel /bin/bash

Second Approach:


Hashed jupyter server pwd: /root/.jupyter/jupyter_server_config.json
